net.sf.jclal.util.distancefunction

Class DistanceContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.util.sort.IndexValueContainer
      • net.sf.jclal.util.distancefunction.DistanceContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KNearestDistanceContainer

    public class DistanceContainer
extends IndexValueContainer
    Implementation of DistanceContainer. Class to store the distance between a set of instances
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
